codeReview.summary: The migration guide at docs/migration-v0.4.md is present and covers all required v0.4 breaking changes (--json default, Commander peer dependency, output()/exitWithError format parameter change, centralized resolveOutputMode(), and dependency-versions Result return) with before/after examples and migration steps.

sharedStateObservations.observation: The docs-worker procedure still mandates `bun run check`, which conflicts with this mission's known pre-existing formatter/check crash and can create avoidable noise during docs-only work.
sharedStateObservations.evidence: /Users/mg/Developer/outfitter/stack/.factory/skills/docs-worker/SKILL.md:65-69 requires `bun run check`; /Users/mg/.factory/missions/ae41b573-bba1-46f1-8355-b618b7b79237/AGENTS.md:72 documents `bun run check` crashing and recommends `bun run lint` + `bun run typecheck`; /Users/mg/.factory/missions/ae41b573-bba1-46f1-8355-b618b7b79237/worker-transcripts.jsonl:3 shows this worker ran `bun run check` and then `bun run format:fix`.

summary: Pass. The feature fully delivers the requested migration documentation with accurate, actionable upgrade guidance and no blocking defects found; one shared-state skill/procedure mismatch was noted.
